message: hello chef what color is the sky

Hello! As an AI chatbot, I don't have the ability to see or perceive things like human beings do. But to answer your question, the color of the sky can vary depending on the time of day and weather conditions. During the day, it is usually blue (with a lighter shade towards the horizon), while during sunrise or sunset, it can range from pink, orange, yellow and red. At night, it appears dark with the stars shining bright.
